name: Buggy Racer (Qais12)
description:
A Game That lets your Creativity be Unleashed

 to make your creative Tracks and test out with your friends and have fun.

Includes 2 maps to preview som of the features.

Controls:

    Car:

        -W/S: on air to tilt the buggy forward and backward.

        -S/Space: on ground for brakes.

        -A/D: control the wheels.

        -R: reset from start point.

    Build Camera:

        -Hold MMB(Middle Mouse Button): Enter Camera Controlling/Positioning Mode.

        -While holding MMB

            -WASD: Move.

            -L Shift: Move Faster.

            -Q/E: Change Height in place.

        -While not holding MMB

            -Mouse Wheel: Change piece rotation.

            -Click MMB: Change rotation axis.

            -Left Click: Place selected piece.

            -Right Click: Select piece to edit.

            -R: Change snap point.
